meanings.definition: The state or quality of not being productive.
meanings.sent1: Her nonproductiveness at work was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team's nonproductiveness led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The nonproductiveness of the lazy cat made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The nonproductiveness of the old machine was like a broken clock.
meanings.sent5: The nonproductiveness of the desert was a stark reminder of its harsh conditions.

meanings.definition: The lack of productivity or effectiveness.
meanings.sent1: The nonproductiveness of the meeting left everyone feeling frustrated.
meanings.sent2: His nonproductiveness in completing tasks was a concern for his boss.
meanings.sent3: The nonproductiveness of the broken pencil sharpener was comical.
meanings.sent4: The nonproductiveness of the leaky faucet was a constant annoyance.
meanings.sent5: The nonproductiveness of the rainy day made it perfect for a movie marathon.
